111232121121.content:
"I get to be fat and be a slob too." Aang couldn't believe what he had heard. Katara was not only understanding about his new found desires to a glutton, but actually wanted to join him? The well mannered girl he had come to love all these years suddenly willing to abandon her thin life and join him in a life of gluttony and pleasure. It was too good to be true. The thought of a Katara almost as big and as fat as him was an unexpectedly arousing thought. Before he could even say anything, Katara crawled on his blubber and got close to his face. She picked her lips and closed in on his face, and once Aang realized what she was doing, he was eager to kiss her back. He closed his eyes and puckered his lips and waited for Katara's kiss.

But then when their lips finally made contact, Aang felt nothing. When he opened his eyes, Katara was gone. He wasn't even in the bathtub where he confessed his feelings anymore. He was in the bedroom covered with the only blanket his friends could find to cover him. Aang put two and two together and realized that confession of his was simply a dream.

Another strange dream. He had been having dreams like this over and over again. Ones where he told his friends he wanted to be fat, and they all happily accepted it and were willing to feed him. Though this was the first time he had a dream where he imagined someone wanting to be as fat as him.

Aang figured, maybe it's a sign that he should final tell his friends about how he missed his fat lifestyle. Even if they did find his new feelings creepy, maybe they could at least help him deal with it somehow and return to his old life. Though there was still the question of who. Neither Sokka or Zuko seemed like a good idea since they seemed totally disgusted with Aang's new body. So one could only imagine how they'd react to them knowing he liked being big and fat. So obviously, he had to tell the girls since they seemed a little bit more willing to accept his new size slightly more than the guys.

First choice was Toph, who Aang suspected might be able to understand his situation more. Since she was a bit of a slob herself, maybe she could see why Aang enjoyed the simple life of being fed and being lazy. Plus she didn't seem to care much about him being fat anyway, so she probably won't mind as much as the others. On the other, Toph might be the type to make fun of him for wanting to be fat.

Then there was Katara, who despite being pretty shocked by his new body, seemed to still care about him. She's been taking care of him the most and still showing him affection. Plus he still loved her, and the dream made it obvious that he wanted to accept that he wanted to be fat. Of course, there is the risk that telling her this could possibly cause her to reject him and ruin his relationship with her.

It was a tough choice, but he had to get these feeling off his chest and hope one of them would accept or help him.

1242.content:
Inside a Fire Nation asylum, a dark soul rested on her bed in mental wreckage. Her state of mind was filled with a deep rage. If she could unleash her pent-up fury, she would have done so weeks ago. But the defeat she was handed and the treatments she was given during her sentence made her fire-bending useless. Staring into the veil of shadows in her cell, Azula's eyes squinted as those recollections of her freedom flared in front of her.

Once she was the Fire Nation Princess; only her parent, the Fire Lord, surpassed her in power. Her father, Ozai, saw her as a miracle. Her mother, Ursa, saw her as a complete nightmare. Everyone else feared her because of her status and abilities. Who wouldn't have? During her reign as the next heir to the Fire Nation throne, Azula had done terrible things in the names of her father and more importantly, herself.

She had helped the Dai Lee bring Ba Sing Se, the last stronghold against her country, to its knees. She almost slayed the Avatar and helped her brother, Zuko, return home. All of this boosted her ego to unfathomable sizes. She felt invincible. Yet no matter what she did, she was never satisfied. Her ego has led her down into a path of craving the torture and anguish of her victims. Like an elbow leech hungry for blood, she craved more.

But soon, things turned for the worse. While trying to stop Zuko and his friends from escaping the Boiling Rock, Azula found herself betrayed by her closest friends: Mai and Ty Lee. That betrayal was the root for worse events to occur for her. During the Fire Nation's final act of destruction, her father presented her the title of Fire Lord. This made Azula proud or perhaps just to hide her true emotions of betrayal. Little by little, Azula's betrayal grew bigger and bigger...

Soon, she became a sitting duck for the stress building inside her. Things only reached their most severe when Zuko, the only other heir to the Fire Nation's throne, challenged her to an Agai Kai. Sozin's comet had increased their fire-shooting abilities to their full potency. During the match, it became clear the two siblings were evenly matched. But Azula knew her normal tactics of intimidation were little use against her brother. With that strength useless, she found herself at the losing point. That's when she cheated.

She attempted to kill Katara, but her brother intervened. Sparing his friend a horrible death from electrocution, Zuko suffered a terrible blow. Azula, having brought him down, cackled in victory as the last pieces of her sanity were shattered. She could have easily finished him off for good if Katara didn't strike back. With her lightning and fie, Azula was confident the Southern Water tribe peasant would fall by her wrath. But one miscalculation became Azula's downfall. Using her water-bending to freeze her, Katara chained Azula's arms tightly and stopped her senseless attack. Azula could only glare as Katara healed Zuko. That one final loss made her snap. Having lost the title of Fire Lord, Azula broke down for good.

Since her defeat, Azula was sentenced to a Fire Nation asylum on an island.

Azula's eyes soon broke out from her trance. She felt her rage overtake her again. Losing her status as Fire Lord made her susceptible to her emotions. As she tried fire-bending, she found it useless.

12523211.content:
It's really hard trying to be unique, when you're one of seven identical siblings. Just ask Ty-Lee. Growing up with six identical sibling, Ty Lee felt like she had to constantly fight for attention. She didn't hate her sisters, she could never do that. She just wished that she didn't feel like she was apart of some matched set.

It was because of these reasons Ty Lee decided to run away on her fourteenth birthday to join the circus. It would give her a chance at a new life, as well as give her the ability to hone her acrobatics which she loved. In the dead of night when no one else was awake, she quickly left a letter saying goodbye to her family and friends before hurrying away to the circus.

The show had ended when Ty Lee arrived. She went to the tents and followed the ringleader into his tent.

"Hello sir." said Ty Lee.

"W-who are you and why are you here? Don't you know the show's over?

"I know that sir, that's why I waited till the end of your performance." She took a deep breath before saying "My name is Ty Lee and I would like to join your circus."

"Really?" said the ringleader, intrigued by this girl's enthusiasm.

"Yep, let me show you what I can do." Ty Lee responded.

Upon saying these words, Ty Lee went to a considerable distance away from the ringleader starting to cartwheel. She then transitioned to moon-saulting and landing right in front of the ringleader.

"So what do you think can I join?" Ty Lee asked, beaming.

"While that was quite impressive, I'm afraid we're not looking for an acrobat at this circus." the ringleader answered.

Ty Lee frowned and hung her head, before hearing the ringleader's next words.

"However if want to work here, I can give you a different role."

"Really?! What is it?! Whatever it is I'll do it!" Ty Lee said with a determined look in her eyes.

"Well, our fat lady recently left after complaining about wanting more money. If you want you can try to take the role." the ringleader replied.

Ty Lee's face become so pink that for a second, it matched her costume. While she did want to join the circus, she didn't want to lose her body or her agility. Ty Lee was struggling to find an answer before she remembered her siblings. How she had to constantly fight an uphill battle just to be noticed. How annoying it could be to share a birthday with six of her family members. How she just wanted her own identity.

"Of course, if you don't want to do it I-"

"What do I have to do to get the job?" Ty Lee asked.

"Our next show is at a faraway village." The ringleader began explaining. "It'll take about three days to get there and another one to set up everything. During that time, you'll be eating what your predecessor ate and you will do what they performed for the show. If you can become as big as her and perform her show flawlessly, then we'll allow you on-board."

"I'll do it." Ty Lee exclaimed.

The ringleader smiled before extending his hand to shake Ty Lee's. She grabbed his hand and shook it.

"When do I begin?" Ty Lee asked.

"In the morning." the ringleader said, yawning. "For now, you can take Zie's tent. She was the fat lady before you." It's the green one on the far left."

Ty Lee walked into the tent. Inside there was a large bed with a noticeable dent in it, most likely from Zie's body.

As Ty Lee got under the covers of the bed, she began wondering what her new life would be liked. While it would be scary, and weird it would be an interesting journey.

Katara had fallen in love only once and after Aang died, she thought she would never love again. She was wrong, though the circumstances couldn't have been more strange or felt more wrong. But the old water bending master was also drawn to Korra's strength and temperment, which reminded her much of herself in her youth. It wasn't long before she deduced that she had fallen in love with the fiery Avatar.

But there was too much at stake to consider acting on those feelings: her great age for one and her family for another. How would it have looked for an old widow to not only go about courting a girl young enough to be her grandaughter? And what would her children think? Bumi and Kya would probably understand, Kya herself having a female partner half her age, but Tenzin? So Katara chose to simply admire Korra from afar, watching her battle Equalists, dark spirits, and anarchy-obsessed terrorists with pride. A chance soon presented itself when a disabled Korra came to her for healing. Too many times had the old master wanted to embrace the desparing young girl and admit her true feelings. It became so bad that Katara was having erotic dreams about Korra and indulging in her most secret fetishes therein.

Katara's fetishes were odd things to say the least. One of her most prominent was a weight gain fantasy, feeding her lover and herself until there were both big and fat. She had never tried it with Aang because the Air Nomad Avatar stayed infuriatingly trim no matter how much he ate, and she feared even her free-spirited husband would be disgusted with the revelation.

Korra made those fantasies come alive as never before. Katara couldn't help but imagine the young Avatar's mighty muscles being replaced with fat, her hard abs dissolving into a big gut. Big guts especially turned Katara on.

When Korra went to the Spirit world with that "Asami" girl, Katara was secretly heartbroken in a way she hadn't been since Aang passed. What the two girls had was stronger than anything Korra had felt for that pale imitation of Zuko she once fancied. It was built to last.

At least, that's what Katara first thought. When Korra returned from her trip alone and reported that Asami had, for reasons the obviously hurt Avatar refused to divulge, the old water bending master was almost ashamed for how happy she felt. It was only a week later when she made her choice and entered the Southern Spirit Portal.

Soon, she stood before Iroh, who said nothing, but smiled and handed her a vial of spirit water. Katara bowed in thanks and made a quick exit. She then returned home and chugged the vial as fast as she could.

Almost instantly, Katara could feel time turning back for her. When it stopped, she found that she was fourteen again. This made her a bit sad as she had hoped to be around Korra's age. Could the Avatar accept a younger woman any more than an older one? Deciding to take things as they come, she boarded the next boat to Republic City.
